articles.title: Orlando Pirates make history for South Africa - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Orlando Pirates lost 1-0 to Enyimba at Enyimba International Stadium in Aba‚ Nigeria late on Wednesday night‚ but still made history for South Africa reached the Caf Confederation Cup quarterfinals.
